name: cameo
content:
cameo noun [C]
(PERFORMANCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small but noticeable part in a film or play, performed by a famous actor: He appears briefly towards the end of the film in a cameo role as a priest.

cameo noun [C]
(JEWELLERY)
a piece of usually oval jewellery on which there is a head or other shape of one colour on a surface of a different colour: a cameo brooch
DEA / A. DAGLI ORTI / Contributor/De Agostini/GettyImages

cameo noun [C]
(JEWELRY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of usually oval jewelry on which the shape of a head or another shape is represented against a background of a different color
cameo noun [C]
(PERFORMANCE)
a brief but noticeable part, esp. in a movie, television program, or performance in a theater, usually by someone who is famous: The former vice president makes a cameo appearance in the movie.
